# airCirculationMode

**Instance Property**

The air circulation mode for the climate control system.

## Declaration

```swift
var airCirculationMode: INCarAirCirculationMode { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to determine whether the user wants fresh air or recirculated air. The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCarAirCirculationMode/unknown] when the user modified a different climate control setting.

## Getting the Climate Control Settings

- **enableClimateControl**: A Boolean value indicating whether to turn on the climate control system.
- **enableAutoMode**: A Boolean value indicating whether to enable automatic mode for the climate control system.
- **temperature**: The specific temperature to set for the climate control system.
- **relativeTemperatureSetting**: A relative temperature setting.
- **climateZone**: The seat position to have its climate settings modified.
